Posted By: wolfbear2 (4/16/2010 7:21:17 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: An excellent card and by far my favorite of the nonrare Eldrazi. It can get onto the field blindingly fast provided you have Eldrazi spawn token ramp, and can start wrecking face as early as turn three. However, it's dead weight if you don't have any spawn tokens, because hardcasting it for 9 is far less efficient than its brother [Ulamog's Crusher](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ulamog's Crusher). Still, the alternate casting cost and the hefty body that still satisfies [Not of This World](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Not of This World)'s alternate casting cost makes this a great card for an Eldrazi deck.
posts.html:
An excellent card and by far my favorite of the nonrare Eldrazi. It can get onto the field blindingly fast provided you have Eldrazi spawn token ramp, and can start wrecking face as early as turn three. However, it's dead weight if you don't have any spawn tokens, because hardcasting it for 9 is far less efficient than its brother Ulamog's Crusher. Still, the alternate casting cost and the hefty body that still satisfies Not of This World's alternate casting cost makes this a great card for an Eldrazi deck.
